answers.answer: It certainly could be serious but to my knowledge has nothing to do with diabetes.  If it persists I would see a Dr.

question: My father is 52 year old and he has diabetes.......not that serious ..i mean he doesnt have to use insulin......but he complained yesterday that its bleeding from anus.........is that anything serious?something like cancer?we are very concerned about him.so please give us a solution...................we really need your help
title: anus bleeding
